title: What is the COP26 climate summit in Glasgow next week all about?
content:
1. What is the COP26 climate summit in Glasgow next week all about?  NPR
  2. Children's hospital staff cycle from London to Glasgow for Cop26 to raise awareness on air pollution  The Independent
  3. Analysis | The climate catastrophe is here, whether governments face it or not  The Washington Post
  4. What Is COP26 and Who's Going? Your Top Climate Summit Questions, Answered  Bloomberg
  5. The next chapter of Britain’s climate policy story will take place in your kitchen  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
